blogs.title: My new 'Adventure' blog!
blogs.body:
Super excited to hang out with 'old Ben' 
 He says we should go see a princess, no matter wHAt my uncle says!
blogs.author: Luke Skywalker

blogs.title: Jabba's greedy
blogs.body:
What was I supposed to do - 
 Even I get borded sometimes. 
 I need a new job to save my neck ASAP ...
blogs.author: Han Solo

blogs.title: I wish I knew my father ...
blogs.body:
Found a bunch of dead jawas 
 Went back home 
 Owen & Veru are dead 
 I'm sad
blogs.author: Luke Skywalker
